snippet.title: All On Board! - Official Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the trailer for All On Board!, a new VR platform where players can make and play board games remotely with their friends. Coming to Meta Quest 2 and SteamVR compatible headsets in 2023, All on Board! will launch with a library of officially licensed board games, including Sword & Sorcery, Black Rose Wars, Escape The Dark Castle, and more.

Players will only need one copy of these licensed games to be able to share them with the rest of their group. You can also design and try your own games using the free modding toolkit available for PC (Windows).Developed by The Game Kitchen, All On Board!'s beta, which will be exclusive to Kickstarter supporters, will be available this Holiday season. You can check out All On Board! on Kickstarter now.

#IGN #Gaming #AllOnBoard
